title: Comcast (CMCSA) Approaches New Upside Target of $58.16
content:
Written on Wed, 09/16/2015 - 12:56pm 
 
By Shiri Gupta 
 
Shares of Comcast ( NASDAQ:CMCSA ) have bullishly opened above the pivot of $56.76 today and have reached the first resistance level of $57.65.  Should the shares continue to rise, the resistance pivots of $58.16 and $59.56 will be of interest. 

Comcast ( NASDAQ:CMCSA ) has potential upside of 22.0% based on a current price of $57.65 and analysts' consensus price target of $70.35.  The stock should find initial resistance at its 200-day moving average (MA) of $58.43 and further resistance at its 50-day MA of $59.77. 

Comcast share prices have moved between a 52-week high of $64.99 and a 52-week low of $49.33 and are now trading 17% above that low price at $57.65 per share.  The 200-day and 50-day moving averages have moved 0.01% higher and 0.56% lower over the past week, respectively. 

SmarTrend recommended that its subscribers protect gains by selling shares of Comcast on July 27th, 2015 by issuing a Downtrend alert when the shares were trading at $61.59. Since that call, shares of Comcast have fallen 7.2%.  We are now looking for when a new Uptrend will commence and will alert SmarTrend subscribers in real time. 
   
 Keywords:  pivot alerts Comcast 
 
 Ticker(s):   CMCSA
